CE 3372 Water Systems Design

Catalog Description

3372. Water Systems Design (3:3:0). Prerequisite: CE 3305, 3354. Hydraulic analysis and design of municipal water distribution, stormwater collection, and wastewater collection systems. Oral and written presentations. (Communication Intensive)

Introduction to EPANET Program

This lesson introduces the EPANET computer program for pipe network analysis. The program computes steady state pressures and flows in a network given node elevations, demands, and pipe properties.

The program is mature (20+ years of development) and is one of a few computation engines used for such simulation (KYPIPE is another computation engine). Most professional software uses some variant of the EPANET engine (but their own interface); a few companies reversed engineered their own engines for specific computational speed-ups to support their clients. The underlying intellectual technology is the same.

The combination of the user interface, and the tested computation engine makes the program straightforward enough that a cat can use it if he can avoid chasing the mouse for sport!

Lesson Notes   Instructor notes used in face-to-face presentation.

EPANET by Example Cleveland, T.G., Tay, C.C., and Neale, C.M. (2015) EPANET by Example. Department of Civil and Environmental Engineering, Texas Tech University.

Hydraulics of Pipelines and Pipe Networks Wurbs, R.A., and James, W. P. (2002) Water Resources Engineering, Prentice Hall; pp.130-156; and 156-198.

Pipe Networks Chin, D. (2006). pp. 27-48 in "Water Resources Engineering, 2 ed." Prentice Hall, Inc.

Water Distribution Systems "Water Distribution Systems" in Land Development Handbook, Ed. S.O. Dewberry, Dewberry Inc., McGraw-Hill

Software Links

EPANET-on-WINE Application bundle for MacOS (stored on theodore-odroid.ttu.edu). Read web page carefully! Probably will not run in Catalina OS. Watch the install video -- there is a specific security override youmust employ to attempt the install.

EPANET 2.0012 Windows installer (stored on theodore-odroid.ttu.edu).

EPANET 2.00.12 Windows installer; official US EPA distribution.
